TextView.android:text: Dayalektor is a mobile application that translates English or Filipino language into different Philippine dialects and vice versa. It has a vocabulary library, a massive compilation of words and phrases with a text-to-speech so that you can learn and practice on how to pronounce those words and phrases. Moreover, this application has a voice activation and voice dictation that auto-responds to any set of phrases you speak instantly and direct voice delivery as a better experience. Additionally, it has a forum where you can ask someone for correction of words or phrases (such as pronunciation, spelling, and grammar) when you can't find those in the application's library.
